original_title: Eagles of Death Metal - I Love You All The Time: Live At The Olympia in Paris
overview: During Eagles Of Death Metal's November 13, 2015 show at the Bataclan concert hall in Paris, gunmen entered the venue and opened fire on the crowd, leaving 89 dead. On February 16, 2016 the band returned to the Olympia in Paris to complete their show.
title: Eagles of Death Metal - I Love You All The Time: Live At The Olympia in Paris
